TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontFamily extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a family of related fonts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体系列是一组共享相同系列名称（如 "New Roman"）但功能不同的字样。A font family is a set of typefaces that share the same family name, such as "Times New Roman", but that differ in features. 这些功能的区别包括 ：斜体和，如 粗体。These feature differences include , such as italic, and , such as bold. ![字体](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "字体")![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") 属于 "New Roman" 字体系列成员的字样示例Example of typefaces that are members of the "Times New Roman" font family 大多数 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素（例如 和 ）提供了一个 属性，该属性可用于为控件的文本内容指定字体。Most [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements, such as and , provide a property that can be used to specify a font for the text content of a control. 通过使用值设置该属性来定义字体 。You define the font by setting that property with a value. 下面的示例演示如何在和代码中引用字体 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。The following examples show how to reference a font, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and in code. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontfallbacksnippet3)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontfallbacksnippet3)] [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml#fontfallbacksnippet3)] 在前面的示例中，引用的字体 "漫画 Sans MS" 被其 *友好名称*引用。In the preceding example, the font that is referenced, "Comic Sans MS", is referred to by its *friendly name*. 此外，在此示例中，该字体假定为系统字体集合中的字体。Also, in this example the font is assumed to be in the system font collection. ## 在备用目录中指定字体Specifying Fonts in Alternate Directories [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序可以指定目录（而不是包含系统字体集合的目录）来解析字体引用。A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application can specify a directory, other than the directory that contains the systems font collection, for resolving font references. 字体的友好名称可以指定绝对统一资源标识符 (URI) 值来解析字体引用，如下面的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 代码示例和代码示例中所示。The friendly name of the font can specify an absolute uniform resource identifier (URI) value to resolve the font reference, as shown in the following [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code examples. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml.cs#fontpackagesnippet6)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontpackagesnippets.xaml.vb#fontpackagesnippet6)] [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml#fontpackagesnippet6)] 字体的友好名称还可以指定一个相对 URI 值，这需要一个基本 URI 来解析字体引用。The friendly name of the font can also specify a relative URI value, which requires a base URI to resolve the font reference. 对象的属性 对应于基 URI 值。The property of the object corresponds to the base URI value. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建由基 URI 值和相对 URI 值组成的字体引用。The following code example shows how to create a font reference that is composed of a base URI value and a relative URI value. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml.cs#fontpackagesnippet7)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontpackagesnippets.xaml.vb#fontpackagesnippet7)] 当你引用作为应用程序的一部分打包的字体时，可以使用基本 URI 值。You can use a base URI value when you reference a font that is packaged as part of the application. 例如，基本 URI 值可以是 "pack://application" URI，这允许你引用打包为应用程序资源的字体。For example, the base URI value can be a "pack://application" URI, which lets you reference fonts that are packaged as application resources. 下面的代码示例演示一个由基 URI 值和相对 URI 值组成的字体引用。The following code example shows a font reference that is composed of a base URI value and a relative URI value. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml.cs#fontpackagesnippet2)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontpackagesnippets.xaml.vb#fontpackagesnippet2)] 如果 将指定为标记中的属性，则基本 URI 值始终是隐式的，它的值是页的 URI [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 。When a is specified as an attribute in markup, the base URI value is always implied - its value is the URI of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page. 隐含的基本 URI 值与友好名称字符串中的相对 URI 值结合使用，以获取字体的位置。The implied base URI value is used with the relative URI value in the friendly name string to obtain the location of the font. 在下面的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 示例中，请注意，相对 uri 值使用 "./" 表示法，这意味着在基 uri 值的 "当前文件夹" 中。In the following [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] example, notice that the relative URI value uses the "./" notation, which means "in the current folder" of the base URI value. [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml#fontpackagesnippet1)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序可以将字体打包为内容项、资源项或库资源项。A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application can package fonts as either a content item, a resource item, or a library resource item. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将字体与应用程序一起打包](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/packaging-fonts-with-applications)。For more information, see [Packaging Fonts with Applications](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/packaging-fonts-with-applications). ## 字体回退Font Fallback 字体回退是指自动替换客户端应用程序所选字体以外的字体。Font fallback refers to the automatic substitution of a font other than the font that is selected by the client application. 调用字体回退的主要原因有两个：There are two primary reasons why font fallback is invoked: - 客户端应用程序指定的字体在系统中不存在。The font that is specified by the client application does not exist on the system. - 客户端应用程序指定的字体不包含呈现文本所需的标志符号。The font that is specified by the client application does not contain the glyphs that are required to render text. 在中 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ，字体回退机制使用默认的备用字体系列 "全局用户界面" 作为替代字体。In[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], the font fallback mechanism uses the default fallback font family, "Global User Interface", as the substitute font. 此字体定义为复合字体，其文件名为 "GlobalUserInterface. CompositeFont"。This font is defined as a composite font, whose file name is "GlobalUserInterface.CompositeFont". 有关复合字体的详细信息，请参阅本主题中的复合字体部分。For more information about composite fonts, see the Composite Fonts section in this topic. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]字体回退机制替代了以前的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] 字体替换技术。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] font fallback mechanism replaces previous [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] font substitution technologies. ## 在代码中定义字体回退顺序Defining a Font Fallback Sequence in Code 您可以在代码中定义字体回退顺序，这允许您定义备用字体。You can define a font fallback sequence in your code, which lets you define an alternate font. 创建 对象时，请为参数提供多个字体系列名称（以逗号分隔）， 如 "漫画 Sans MS，Verdana"。When you create a object, provide multiple font family names, separated by commas, for the parameter, such as "Comic Sans MS, Verdana". 在这种情况下，如果 "漫画 Sans MS" 字样的字形不可用，则使用 "Verdana" 字样的字形。In this case, if the glyphs from the "Comic Sans MS" typeface are not available, glyphs from the "Verdana" typeface are used. 如果 "漫画 Sans MS" 和 "Verdana" 均不具有所需的字形，则使用字样的备用字体系列，默认情况下为 "全局用户界面"。If neither "Comic Sans MS" nor "Verdana" have the required glyphs, the fallback font family of the typeface is used, which is "Global User Interface" by default. 下面的示例演示如何在和代码中定义字体回退顺序 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。The following examples show how to define a font fallback sequence, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and in code. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontfallbacksnippet1)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontfallbacksnippet1)] [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml#fontfallbacksnippet1)] 回退序列中的任何一种字体都可以指定字体位置。Any one of the fonts in the fallback sequence can specify font locations. 在下面的示例中，"Pericles Light" 被称为 "应用程序资源"，"Verdana" 作为系统字体集合成员引用。In the following examples, "Pericles Light" is referenced as an application resource, and "Verdana" is referenced as a system font collection member. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontfallbacksnippet2)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontfallbacksnippet2)] [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontFallbackSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml#fontfallbacksnippet2)] ## 复合字体Composite Fonts 该 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 平台提供了一种复合字体功能，以允许构造全范围多语言字体，避免显示缺失的字形。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] platform provides a composite font feature to allow the construction of full range multilingual fonts, and to avoid displaying missing glyphs. 复合字体会将 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 字体链接、字体回退、字体绑定、字体关联和最终用户定义的字符替换 (EUDC) 机制。Composite fonts replace the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] font linking, font fallback, font binding, font association, and end-user-defined characters (EUDC) mechanisms. 与 任何其他字体系列一样，复合字体系列可通过和构造函数用于应用程序 。A composite font family is available to applications through the and constructors just like any other font family. 每个复合字体系列都命名为，并且与其他字体一样，可以为其名称提供多种语言的本地化变体。Each composite font family is named, and, as with other fonts, can provide localized variants of its name in multiple languages. 以下标记示例演示如何将复合字体系列定义为磁盘文件。The following markup example shows how a composite font family can be defined as a disk file. 此文件可以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 与任何其他安装的字体一起存储在默认字体目录中，也可以通过在按名称引用系列时包含其 URI 来在任何位置引用。This file can be stored in the default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] font directory as with any other installed font, or can be referenced in any location by including its URI when referencing the family by name. 下面的示例显示了 "" 中的字体系列标记。CompositeFont "文件。The following example shows the font family markup in a ".CompositeFont" file. [!code-xaml[CompositeFontMarkup#CF](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CompositeFontMarkup/CS/comp.xaml#cf)] 在 WPF 安装过程中，将在默认的 Windows 字体目录中显示以下四个复合字体。The following four composite fonts appear in the default Windows font directory as part of the WPF installation. |字体Font|备注Notes| |----------|-----------| |GlobalMonospace.CompositeFontGlobalMonospace.CompositeFont|使用等宽字体呈现文本，例如，为拉丁字符 "宋体"。Renders text by using a monospace font, for example, "Courier New" for Latin characters.| |GlobalSanSerif.CompositeFontGlobalSanSerif.CompositeFont|使用 sans serif 字体（例如，"Arial" 表示拉丁字符）呈现文本。Renders text by using a sans serif font, for example, "Arial" for Latin characters.| |GlobalSerif.CompositeFontGlobalSerif.CompositeFont|使用衬线字体呈现文本，例如，为拉丁字符 "New Roman"。Renders text by using a serif font, for example, "Times New Roman" for Latin characters.| |GlobalUserInterface.CompositeFontGlobalUserInterface.CompositeFont|使用默认字体（例如，"New Roman" 表示拉丁字符）呈现文本。Renders text by using a default font, for example, "Times New Roman" for Latin characters.| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *fontFamilyName**fontFamilyName* 指定字体系列名称的字符串。A string specifying a font family name. 例如，`"Arial"` 或 `"Century Gothic"`。For example, `"Arial"` or `"Century Gothic"`. *fontFamilyNamesList**fontFamilyNamesList* 指定多个字体系列名称的字符串（每个名称之间用逗号分隔） () 中忽略逗号之后的任何空白。A string specifying multiple font family names, each separated by a comma (any white space following a comma is ignored). 指定的第一个字体系列用作主要字体系列;在主要字体系列不可用或不适用的情况下，后续字体系列用作备用系列。The first font family specified serves as the primary font family; subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 例如，将 `"Arial, Century Gothic"` 宋体指定为主要字体系列，并将世纪宋指定为备用字体系列。For example, `"Arial, Century Gothic"` specifies Arial as the primary font family, with Century Gothic as the fallback font family. *fontFamilyFolderReference**fontFamilyFolderReference* 指定包含字体的文件夹以及字体系列名称的字符串。A string specifying a folder containing the font, along with a font family name. 文件夹和字体系列名称之间用 # 字符进行分隔。The folder and font family name are delimited by a # character. 文件夹引用可以是绝对的，也可以是相对的。The folder reference may be absolute, or relative. 例如 `"Custom Fonts\#My Custom Font"`。For example, `"Custom Fonts\#My Custom Font"`. *fontFamilyUriReference**fontFamilyUriReference* 一个字符串，指定 (URI) 的统一资源标识符，以及字体系列名称。A string specifying a uniform resource identifier (URI) for the font, along with a font family name. URI 和字体系列名称由 # 字符分隔。The URI and font family name are delimited by a # character. 例如 `"http://MyFontServer/Fonts/#My Custom Font"`。For example, `"http://MyFontServer/Fonts/#My Custom Font"`.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化匿名 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an anonymous class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要以编程方式创建复合字体，请使用此无参数的构造函数。Use this parameterless constructor when you want to create a composite font programmatically. 这意味着不必为构造函数指定字体系列名称，但必须在和集合中填充集合， 然后 才能使用构造的实例。This means that you do not have to specify a font family name for the constructor, but you must populate the collections in the and collections prior to using the constructed instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string familyName) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: familyName
param.span: 构成新 的一个或多个系列名称。

span.span: The family name or names that comprise the new .

param.span: 多个系列名称之间应使用逗号分隔。

span.span: Multiple family names should be separated by commas.

summary.span: 从指定的字体系列名称初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified font family name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数中指定的每个系列名称 `familyName` 前面可以有一个位置引用， (URI) 的目录或统一资源标识符。Each family name that is specified in the `familyName` parameter can be preceded by a location reference to either a directory or a uniform resource identifier (URI). 位置引用与系列名称之间用井号 (`#`) 字符分隔开。The location reference is separated from the family name by a pound (`#`) character. 参数中指定的多个系列名称 `familyName` 必须用逗号分隔。Multiple family names that are specified in the `familyName` parameter must be separated by commas. 每个系列可以是直接表示一组共享相同系列名称的一组字体文件的真实字体，也可以是对复合字体文件中定义的系列名称的引用。Each family can be a real font that directly represents a set of font files that share the same family name, or can be a reference to a family name that is defined in a composite font file. 标识多个系列后，第二个和后续字体系列作为备用系列，处理第一个字体系列不支持的码位。When multiple families are identified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families, handling code points that are not supported by the first font family. 对于第一个字体系列不支持的每个码位，将依次检查每个后续系列。For every code point that is not supported by the first font family, each subsequent family is checked in turn. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#103)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#103)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `familyName`该值可以指定一个相对 uri 值，这需要一个基 uri 来解析字体引用。The `familyName` value can specify a relative URI value, which requires a base URI to resolve the font reference. `baseUri`值可以为 `null` 。The `baseUri` value can be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码演示一个由基 URI 值和相对 URI 值组成的字体引用。The following code shows a font reference that is composed of a base URI value and a relative URI value. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml.cs#fontpackagesnippet2)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontpackagesnippets.xaml.vb#fontpackagesnippet2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `null`如果字体系列名称不依赖于基 URI 来解析字体引用，则返回值为。The return value is `null` if the font family name does not rely on a base URI for resolving the font reference. 若要检索用于构造对象的字体系列名称 ，请使用 属性。To retrieve the font family name that is used to construct the object, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 从对象检索属性的结果 。The following example shows the results of retrieving the property from a object. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontPackageSnippets.xaml.cs#fontpackagesnippet9)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontPackageSnippet9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontpackagesnippets.xaml.vb#fontpackagesnippet9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FamilyMaps As FontFamilyMapCollection

A that contains objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 使用字体系列名称创建的对象，该 属性将返回一个空的只读集合。For objects that are created by using a font family name, the property returns an empty, read-only collection. 对象定义要用于显示指定区域性的指定 Unicode 字符集的字体。The object defines which font to use for displaying a specified set of Unicode characters of a specified culture.
